mapper.select: SELECT ADMIN.ID, ADMIN.NAME, ADMIN.TEL, ADMIN.REGION_CDs AS REGION_CODES, GROUP_CONCAT(REGION_CODE.REGIONNAME ORDER BY ADMIN.REGION_CDs SEPARATOR ';') AS REGION_NAMES, ADMIN.USE_YN FROM TBL_ADMIN ADMIN LEFT JOIN TBL_REGION_CODE REGION_CODE ON ADMIN.REGION_CDs LIKE CONCAT('%', REGION_CODE.REGIONCD, '%') WHERE ADMIN.AUTHORIZATION = 'MANAGER' GROUP BY ADMIN.ID, ADMIN.NAME, ADMIN.TEL, ADMIN.REGION_CDs

SELECT ADMIN.ID, ADMIN.NAME, ADMIN.TEL, ADMIN.REGION_CDs AS regionCode, REGION_CODE.REGIONNAME, ADMIN.USE_YN FROM TBL_ADMIN ADMIN LEFT JOIN TBL_REGION_CODE REGION_CODE ON ADMIN.REGION_CDs = REGION_CODE.REGIONCD WHERE ADMIN.ID = #{id}
